name: Im Still Here Longwear Clean Matte Liquid Lipstick
about: What it is:A lightweight, long-wearing, and transfer-proof clean liquid lipstick in an ultra-matte finish..Formulation Type:Liquid Lipstick.Benefits:Long-wearing.Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Get Gwens signature lip with this weightless liquid lipstick. This intensely pigmented, clean formula locks in one-swipe, budgeproof color with major staying poweru2014no fading, feathering, or transferring. It dries down to an ultra-matte finish and wears really comfortably on lips. It is also 100 percent vegan.
ingredients: Isododecane, Mica, Polybutene, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer, Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Alumina, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Jojoba Esters, C10-18 Triglycerides, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera (Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax), Aroma (Flavor), Tocopherol, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 6)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On dry lips, define and shape with the edge of applicator..-Then fill and perfect. .-This buildable formula goes on in one swipe but can be layered. .-Wait for the formula to dry down before applying a second layer...All GXVE Beauty outer boxes are 100% recyclable. Our primary containers are made with sustainable materials, including 30% or higher PCR (post-consumer recycled) plastic or glass.

It's impressively long-wearing with minimal transfer, making it perfect for those busy days when I need my lipstick to stay put.The packaging is stunning, following the sleek black, white, and gold aesthetic that the GXVE line is known for. Even the boxes have a modern, chic design that adds a touch of luxury to the overall experience. This liquid lipstick is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for long-lasting, vibrant color with a comfortable matte finish! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this matte liquid lipstick as I am a big fan of GXVE products, and have many of hers that I love entirely. However, this one definitely is not on that list. First and foremost, the consistency of this lipstick feels super sticky and rough upon application. No matter how I applied this (i.e., on dry lips, damp, and moisturized) it went all the same, and it felt like chalk. It highlighted cracks and crevices on my lips that I certainly did not need to be highlighted.   I do have to admit, that the color itself is a beautiful shade IF it would last. I only had this lipstick on for about an hour before drinking and it almost entirely wiped away the color. This was surprising to me, especially being a shade of red (isn't red one of the most difficult shades to take off?!). For the price, quality, and description, this just isn't worth it to me. If you're looking for a matte lipstick that is hydrating, long-lasting, and gives a beautiful color payoff, this just isn't it. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

When I apply it by its own, the lip gross makes my lips look glossy, but not too much. I also feel some hydration. It covers my lips without making even tiny wrinkles visible. If to apply as a single product, it doesnt last long, I need to renew it every hour or about that. reviews.review_text: Among the impressive lineup of GXVE by Gwen Stefani lip products, the matte liquid lipstick stands out as my favorite.  The application process is a dream; it glides on like a lip gloss, providing that initial smooth, hydrating feel before drying down to a sophisticated matte finish. This liquid lipstick does have a bit more transfer compared to the matte lipsticks in the line, but it's still quite minimal, which is a big plus for long-lasting wear.  The shade I tried, Original Recipe, is a deep, rich red that is simply stunning. Im not usually one to gravitate towards dramatic lip colors, but this shade completely won me over. Its bold and it adds a touch of glam to any look.  Overall, the GXVE liquid lipstick is a standout product. Its combination of easy application, beautiful color payoff, and long-wearing matte finish makes it a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their lip game. Whether you're a fan of bold reds or just looking for a reliable matte liquid lipstick, this one is definitely worth a try.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: almost chalky texture on my lips.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE BY GWEN STEFANIs Im Still Here Longwear Clean Matte Liquid Lipstick unfortunately didnt meet my expectations. As a beauty enthusiast who loves a good matte liquid lipstick, I was disappointed by the formula. While the color payoff is initially intense and bold, the product dries down to an uncomfortable, almost chalky texture on my lips.  The lipstick felt excessively drying, and within a few hours, it started to flake and crumble, leaving my lips looking uneven and patchy. Reapplying only made it worse, as the formula didnt layer well, leading to even more flakiness and discomfort. Despite being marketed as longwear, it didnt hold up through eating or drinking, and I found myself needing to reapply frequently, which is frustrating for a product that promises durability.  Additionally, the applicator made it difficult to achieve a precise line, and the formula tended to feather at the edges, requiring extra effort to clean up. While I appreciate the clean beauty aspect, the performance didnt live up to the hype, and I wouldnt recommend this product if youre looking for a reliable, comfortable matte liquid lipstick.

I highly recommend the Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick especially if youre a fan of rich, red shades and a lightweight formula. In terms of application, the product dries quickly, which is a plus for those looking for an efficient makeup routine. The matte texture, once set, provides a flawless and modern finish. reviews.review_text: As a makeup, skincare, and overall beauty enthusiast, I really wanted to love this liquid lipstick for multiple reasons. Speaking truly to the products, Ive found her traditional lipsticks and the highlighter palettes to be super high quality for the reasonable price point and fun to use, not to mention aesthetically pleasing in packaging. This liquid lipstick definitely follows that trend! I really love the bottle this is in and how hyper pigmented the color is. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In the bustling world of beauty and cosmetics, the quest for the perfect matte liquid lipstick seems endless. Products promising longevity, pigment, and comfort are plentiful, yet few deliver on all fronts. However, GXVE by Gwen Stefanis Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick breaks the mold, offering an exceptional balance of performance and wearability. As a cosmetologist constantly on the lookout for standout products, I find this lipstick to be a noteworthy addition to any makeup collection. Here's why.   The texture of Im Still Here is remarkably smooth for a matte liquid lipstick. Its application is effortless, gliding over the lips with a lightweight feel that defies the expectation of a matte finish. The formula dries quickly, leaving a velvety finish that doesn't flake or cake.  One of the most impressive aspects of this lipstick is its staying power. It lives up to its name, remaining vibrant and intact through meals and daily wear, which is a considerable feat for a matte liquid lipstick. Unlike many long-lasting formulas, Im Still Here does not sacrifice comfort for durability. It maintains a flexible feel on the lips, avoiding the tightness or dryness often associated with matte products.  The pigmentation of GXVEs Im Still Here Matte Liquid Lipstick is rich and vivid, offering opaque coverage in a single swipe. The color payoff is impressive, providing a bold and uniform appearance that enhances the lips beautifully. This high level of pigmentation also means that the product can be used sparingly, extending its lifespan and offering greater value.  The versatility of the shades ensures that there's something for everyone, whether you're looking for a subtle enhancement or a dramatic statement.  GXVEs Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick stands out in the crowded market of matte lip products for several compelling reasons. Its unparalleled blend of long-lasting wear, comfort, and intense pigmentation sets a new sta

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi everyone my name is Amy and I am a cosmetologist that specializes in nails. However I have a special interest in skincare that grew while in beauty school. I have been super intrigued with skin care and finding new product that works for me to be able to share with friends, family, and clients. I was beyond excited to be able to try out Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick. I am pretty shocked at how smooth this lipstick glides on and how easy the application is. It feels velvety at first and slowly dries down giving me enough time to fix any mistakes before it dries down. I just love how buttery it feels when applying I dont even know how to explain it properly. I do not think it lasts as long as others which is a bummer. I dont agree with it being transfer proof though. It did flake up after re application on my every once in a while as well but overall a great lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 90's teen who was infatuated with the one and only Gwen herself, this lipstick REALLY did it for me! It took me back to every other lippie that I've tried since I was 14 years old. This is the MOTHER of them all! The packaging, the color payoff, it's longevity, and THE COLOR is pure perfection!! Not too dry, and not silky all wrapped in one. The colors Original Recipe & Tragic Me were the perfect shades for my day to night look! Even my husband, who's heard about my makeup infatuation for over 20 years now has said that he loves these shades. Thank you, Gwen, for bringing back a piece of my teen years that can now be shared with the new generation that's helping us re-live the 90's, baby! Having a formula that is Vegan & Cruelty-free makes me love it even more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE I'm Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick is great. Love the packaging as well. Color payoff and long lasting product. I've tried the mascara in the past and it was amazing so I was really excited to try the liquid lipsticks. It's not super drying and they last all day. I usually love putting on a little bit of lip balm before any matte product so I did apply a little before as well. The applicator makes it super smooth and precise for you to get the perfect lip. The colors are so gorgeous, perfect on any beauty skin tone and I love how clean the formulas are. So far I've been very impressed and happy with all GXVE makeup products. At times I've had allergic reactions to lipsticks. Unfortunately as l've gotten older I've developed sensitive skin. But these babies are great!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I could not been happier learning that I would be able to review new GXVE colour line. Gwen herself is always looking put together and sharp, that aestetics permeates through her whole line with some extraordinary products.  GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick is a liquid stain that comes in variety of colours with one of the very good applicators I came across. It coats your lips with one thin but colour potent layer that stays on through drinking, eating (depends in the food, might need to reapply colour in the middle of the lips after eating), kissing and living your life.   I found GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick to be a tiny bit on the dryer side but nothing too dramatic, just needed to do more thorough lip prep with ability to glide on the lips and absolute great colour pay off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick and heres my experience and opinions on it.  I really like the true red color, its such a highly pigmented and also bold statement. I also liked the more neutral color one as well.  I like that that the liquid lipstick was easy to apply and wear without much transfer. Its not overly drying on my lips and I like to put lip gloss after if I want a glossier finish.  I also like the recycled packaging and the lipstick container, it has a classic look.  Overall, the liquid lipstick didnt disappoint and also I find that its really easy to reapply without much hassle. The wear throughout the day is good and doesnt come off too much throughout the day. I like to take it off with a cleansing melt and it comes off easily.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Definitely worth adding to your kit!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having tested the GXVE I'm Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick as a professional makeup artist, I am thrilled to share my experience with this exceptional product.  First and foremost, the pigmentation of this liquid lipstick is unparalleled. With just a small amount of product, it delivers intense, opaque color that lasts throughout the day. The highly pigmented formula ensures vibrant and bold lips with every application.  What truly sets this liquid lipstick apart is its long-lasting performance. Once applied, it stays put for hours on end without fading, smudging, or transferring. This makes it the perfect choice for all-day wear, whether you're attending a special event or going about your daily activities.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful shades but not practical for everyday
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an esthetician with a background in makeup artistry I love that Gwen's makeup line is clean and vegan. I'm not huge on matte liquid lipsticks these days but I like both of these shades a lot. The muted shade flannel and formula of both does remind me of the matte liquid lipstick trend of 2016-2018. Both shades are pretty and very rich in pigment but definitely felt dry on the lips. It's not the most dry liquid lip formula I've ever experienced but it did honestly feel pretty heavy. I noticed the more layers of product you apply the heavier and dryer the product will feel on the lip. On a dryness scale of 1-10 I'd give them around a 7. I noticed transfering with both shades especially around the edges. It's not kiss proof (or beverage proof) but they are pretty shades and it does last longer on the lip than a typical bullet lipstick. I prefer a smaller doe foot applicator than these larger ones these have because they made it difficult to expertly apply crisp clean lines. Both shades were quite hard for me to remove and the removal process was messy. I used a micellar makeup wipe for shade flannel and it did not cut it at all, even with the help of a lip scrub. I had to grab a damp makeup eraser cloth to really get it off the remaining product off after really working overtime with the makeup wipe and lip scrub. I noticed a little bit of a blue tint left over on my lips after I took off shade flannel but nothing too intense. Shade original recipe basically did not budge with the micellar wipe so this time I went in with organic coconut oil. I used the coconut oil like a cleaning balm to remove it. This was the quickest way to remove it though the process was still pretty messy. Overall I'd say these are lovely shades but I wouldn't recommend them for events or everyday use obecause they transfer when you eat/drink/kiss/etc. and they are not very comfortable on the lip.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician, makeup artist and working in the beauty industry long time I want to share with you my professional opinion and personal experience to use absolutely lovable and gorgeous u201c Im Still Here High Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick from GXVE Brand formulated in 8 beautiful shades. I am using every morning Flannel color (dusty rose), at night - Original Recipe ( elegant classic red color), and I love that this liquid lipstick is clean, vegan and cruelty free. I love the bright colors and this lipstick is stay long on my lips without feathering or fading with Matte finish. I love the packaging - very luxurious looks and have mirror. Applicator is very comfortable and working great. I love light and pleasant scent. I recommend to anyone this High Performance weightless Liquid Lipstick!   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick is impressive. Its beautiful packaging with super color payoff and long lasting wear. Of course, I have the Original Recipe but my favorite  shade is Flannel. Its a great everyday go-to that lasts all day, perfect for the office. The doe foot applicator makes it super easy to apply and get those sharp lines. I also like to soften the look by dabbing it with my fingers for the blurring effect. It dries down fast and soft. After a while it does start to break up but its an easy fix to add a few more dabs, unlike other so called long wear matte liquid lipsticks. Overall, Im very impressed with the u201cCleanu201d formula, color payoff and long wear performance.    Ive been in the beauty industry for 30+ years. Within that time, Ive worked for a handful of cosmetic/skincare brands. In addition, I worked as a cosmetologist for 7+ years, makeup and lash artist as well. I have mature, oily/combination skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick in Original Recipe is such a pretty true red tone! Sometimes it is very hard to find an actual true red tone, and I am very happy with this color!  It glides on very smoothly and effortlessly. It gives a very nice matte finish without drying out the lips or cracking. The pigment glides on very well without having to over apply this liquid lipstick.  The GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick stay on for a very long time and you do not have to reapply it through the day. Unlike other liquid lipsticks, which I am hesitant to try, this did not dry out my lips or make my lips feel heavy or stiff.   I definitely recommend the GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick, and cannot wait to try the other colors in the line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a licensed Esthetician for over four years and a Registered Nurse for over 30 years and am always looking for products and cosmetics to improve my personal appearance as well as my skin health. My appearance is very important to me as far as my clients first impression.  I try all products on myself before I recommend to my clients based on skin type so I know how it looks feels and smells.   GXVE Im Still Here Lightweight Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick is a new favorite in my makeup bag.  It is beautifully packaged with a small tip applicator.  It is easy to apply, I like to apply it just above my lip line to give my lips a bigger appearance and to define my cupids bow.  It is easy to apply, it took about 3 minutes for it to not feel tacky and it stayed on until I ate and drank and then I needed to reapply. I used moisturizer on my lips first if they were dry in the am, then applied the lipstick, and it is truly long wear, didnt need to reapply until after eating.  It gave my lips a nice smooth matte finish, I didnt notice any cracking.  My favorite color is Flannel, for a natural effect for day wear.

reviews.review_text: Hello! As a beauty enthusiast, I love testing products and giving my honest opinion on how well these beauty items have worked for me. I tried the High Performing Matte Liquid Lipstick in the shade Original Recipe. This shade is a medium deep red that is a classic, especially when going out at night. I love how this liquid lipstick gave me some room to make sure the lines were clean before it dried down. Once the lipstick dried, it appeared matte and really wore true to a lipstick! reviews.review_title: A Matte that doesnt flake or crack
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 32 year old beauty enthusiast and I live in Arizona. I have very fair, dry skin as well as dry, flaky lips.  I love wearing lipsticks but am often worried that a matte lipstick will be too drying for me.  Ive been a Gwen Stefani fan for decades and have always adored her classic, true red lip against her very tan skin and platinum blonde hair. I think the contrast of the bright red against the very light features always looks good. Lipstick always makes me feel prettier, dressier and more confident.  Im Still Here Lightweight Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick is truly unique. The packaging is beautifully and it comes with a lot of product for a good price. You truly only need one swipe. Less is more. I typically like to wear lipliners with lipsticks but that isnt necessary! The application tip turned on its side makes for a thinner tip that is easier to apply and make sure you dont get lipstick anywhere you dont want it. I am so impressed and amazed that my lips dont feel extra dry and arent visibly flaking and cracking. It almost feels like nothing is on my lips at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the I'm still here Flannel colored matte lipstick! From the packaging having a fun print inside, to the lipgloss style container holding the lipstick, this is an excellent long lasting lipstick. It gives me very precise lines, with no lipstick running into the creases or outside of the lip. It stays put and doesn't get all over your drinks or straws. I love the color Flannel it's exactly the color I'm always looking for. A nude that's dark enough to scream sexy even when I'm not trying! The container feels good in my hand, with exact edges and heavy duty acrylic. This lipstick and it's container is gorgeous and extravagant. Completely on par with Gwen Stefani's look and style. I will definitely be buying GXVE again in the future!

reviews.review_title: The best red lippie for performers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am wonderfully impressed and surprised by GXVEs Im Still Here Longwear Clean Matte Liquid Lipsticks! I find most liquid lipsticks I have tried are dry and cause the lips to look crusty. Because of that reason, I have not reached for liquid lipsticks. But I am glad I gave liquid lipsticks another shot! The shade Original Recipe is a true beautiful red! I have never seen a more beautiful, pure red! As a former competitive dancer, I would have LOVED to have this liquid lipstick! All performers, this red lip is a must buy!! It is so beautiful for the holidays as well.   I also tried the shade Flannel. The only downside with Flannel for me personally is that the shade seems much different than on the lips once it dries down. I am paler skinned so this dusty rose reads much more vampy purple on me and my skin tone. I think it would be beautiful for those with a tanner complexion. The formula is soft and velvety and does not BUDGE! The scent is a super yummy, not overly sweet scent, not chemically at all like some lip products. Also a bonus is that this is a clean product. I would recommend this to all lip product lovers to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gxve I'm still here liquid matte lipstick is the matte of my dreams. I say that as someone who is not a matte lipstick girlie. This liquid lippy wears beautifully. It dries down to an almost velvet like feel without drying my lips out. The color pay out is insane after just one application. No streaks! No feathering! It is very transfer resistant. And it taste like vanilla frosting in the best way.  I wore mine for and entire six hour shift and did not need to reapply. It didn't transfer on my coffee cup or my husband's cheek. It's a powerhouse of a lipstick. I also love the bigger applicator which makes applying a breeze.   Cruelty free and vegan are important to me so I was thrilled to see this lippy is both as well as being a clean product. It just hits all the marks. It made a matte believer out of me.   Flannel is my personal favorite color, it a mauvy color that reminds me of a rainy fall morning curled up with a book looking out of a window. Just relaxing. I love it so much. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out GXVE Beauty's I'm Still Here Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick in the shade Flannel, and I must say, it has quickly become one of my go-to matte lipsticks.  Having previously owned the signature shade, Original Recipe, I already knew I was in for a treat with the quality of GXVE lipsticks. The shade Flannel, however, took my breath away. It's absolutely beautiful dusty mauve and adds a touch of elegance to any look.  What sets this matte liquid lipstick apart is not just its stunning color range but also its incredible comfort on the lips. The formula feels weightless, and I can wear it all day without any discomfort. It's the perfect balance between a matte finish and a comfortable wear, which is a rare find in the world of matte lipsticks.  One of the standout features for me is its long-lasting power. The lipstick is truly budge-proof and stays put even after hours of wear. I especially appreciate that it's mask-proof, ensuring that the color remains vibrant without any transfer or feathering.  The clean beauty aspect of GXVE products is another reason why I'm a fan. Knowing that the formula is vegan, cruelty-free, and free from harmful ingredients adds to the overall appeal of the product. It's not just a lipstick; it's a clean and conscious choice for my beauty routine.  In conclusion, if you're in search of a high-performance matte liquid lipstick that combines long-lasting color, comfort, and clean beauty, look no further than GXVE Beauty's I'm Still Here. The shade Flannel has won me over, and I'm excited to explore more colors in this fantastic collection.

reviews.review_text: This I'm Still Here Lightweight Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick has the most amazing formula!! it literally feels like velvet on your lips!! I love the applicator and the color payout is superb!! this has easily become my new favorite lippie ever!!! The 2 colors I tried were  Flannel: A warm, earthy hue that whispers sophistication. Glide it on for a subtle, everyday look that lasts from dawn to dusk.  Transfer proof for all day stay.   Originally Recipe: Its ultra-matte finish is both lightweight and longwearing. Glide it on for a bold statement that wont budge. The intense color payoff and transfer-proof formula make it a winner. Whether youre belting out tunes or sipping coffee, your crimson lips will stay put all day.   Overall, I definitely think anyone who tried these will fall on love with them like I have. I need every color they make!! Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The I'm Still Here Lightweight Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick from GXVE by Gwen Stefani is a fantastic addition to any makeup collection. I received the colors Flannel and Original Recipe, this lipstick offers a wide range of options to suit different preferences and occasions.  First and foremost, the lightweight formula of this liquid lipstick is a standout feature. It glides on smoothly and evenly, providing a comfortable and weightless feel on the lips, ensuring a pleasant wearing experience throughout the day.  The Flannel shade is a beautiful mauve with a hint of brown, perfect for everyday wear. It adds a touch of sophistication to any makeup look and complements a variety of skin tones. On the other hand, the Original Recipe shade is a bold and vibrant red that exudes confidence and glamour. It's a classic choice for special occasions or when you want to make a statement.  The longevity of this lipstick is impressive. Once applied, it stays put for hours without fading or smudging. Even after eating or drinking, the color remains intact, requiring minimal touch-ups. This makes it ideal for long days or events where you don't want to constantly worry about reapplying your lipstick.  The applicator is another noteworthy aspect of this product. Its precise doe-foot design allows for easy and precise application, ensuring clean lines and a professional finish. The formula dries down quickly, so you don't have to wait long before going about your day.  In conclusion, the I'm Still Here Lightweight Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick from GXVE by Gwen Stefani in the colors Flannel and Original Recipe is a must-have for lipstick enthusiasts. Its lightweight formula, long-lasting wear, beautiful shades, and user-friendly applicator make it a standout product. Whether you're looking for an everyday nude or a bold red, this lipstick delivers on all fronts. Give it a try and experience the confidence and glamour it brings to your makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick feels buttery when applied. It glides on evenly, is fully pigmented, and stays in place without feathering. The best part of it all, is that this is very comfortable and non-drying. This stayed on my lips throughout an eight hour shift of work while sipping water throughout that time and lots of talking. I was shocked to see that it lasted so long. I reapplied 19 hours later after eating and that's only because I don't like to eat with things on my lips. I'm confident that it probably would have lasted throughout my meal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Space Buns, I love the name, is a bright, orange tone red and I love shades like these. It's very similar to a Morphe Cosmetics liquid lipstick I loved in the shade Hot Shot. LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Flannel is a warm tone, in my opinion, dusty rose and I love the way it looks on the lips and I feel like it works for everyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't know anything about the GXVE By Gwen Stefani liquid lipsticks, honestly and I was interested in them when I saw on sale at Sephora. The shade Cow Girl is a warm tone mauve/pink, which I love and it's such a good formula, incredible scent and stays on your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: With over 25 years as a licensed cosmetologist specializing in skincare and professional makeup artistry, I must say Gwen Stefani's makeup line is truly remarkable. I recently tried the I'm Still Here lightweight, long-wear matte lipstick in the color original recipe and it's stunning. The true red shade is beautiful and highly pigmented. Once dried, it feels weightless, doesn't transfer, and doesn't bleed into fine lines. Surprisingly, I opted to skip the lip pencil, and the application was precise without it. The substantial and well-designed packaging adds to the overall appeal u2013 it feels great in the hand and is a joy to take out of your handbag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved skin care since I was young. It only made sense that I became an aesthetician. My passion for skin care overflowed into make up as well as supplemental. I currently work for a naturopath doctor and we help people heal from the inside out. I perform numerous treatments to help slow the aging process. I couldn't love what I do any more and only wish to help more people through my knowledge and training of skin and makeup practices as well as my education on nutritional supplements.  Love the Matte Liquid Lipstick by GXVE. It is highly pigmented bold clean color. These lip colors really match their swabs and dont fade! I could compare this to a lip stain with the incredible staying power in these lipsticks. After eating and drinking, the lip color was still there! I love to top with a gloss for some added shine.

reviews.review_title: GXVes Im Still Here Liquid Lipstick Lasts
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello I am Michele and Im a Beauty Expert in my 30s. I have been a Gwen Stefani fan since I was in Junior High! She is the perfect mix of rebel punk rockstar meets glamorous beauty like me. When I heard of GXVE Beauty, I jumped at the chance to try it for myself. The GXVE Im Still Here Lightweight Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick has a unique formulation for a lipstick. Im so used to using a stick of lipstick that has a matte finish. This lipstick has a creamy, liquid lipstick, lipgloss texture, yet its not shiny like a lipgloss. Its tube is clear with black and white letters and it has a golden lid. It even has a doe foot applicator. I like to use the shiny, golden mirror like lid of this tube as a mini cosmetic mirror to help me apply this lipstick to my lips. It comes in a box that is a light brown color and has a fun red and white design on the inside. I had the pleasure of trying both the Flannel and Original Recipe shades. The Flannel shade is a beautiful dusty rose. I love its brownish, pink color. Original Recipe is a true red color and the perfect shade of red for me. It works so well with my fair skin. Its such a beautiful pop of color. Its now my go to red lipstick. This is a longwear liquid lipstick. I love how long the color lasts. It has a beautiful gourmand vanilla frosting scent and flavor. It takes me back to the scents of lipglosses I used in the early 2000s. I would recommend this to any rebellious rockstar in their teens and older looking for a matte,liquid lipstick that will provide your lips with a beautiful, creamy, hydrating formulation that wont budge and has a long lasting bold color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick in shades u201cOriginal Recipeu201d and u201cFlannelu201d. Original recipe is a beautiful shade of red that screams classic while flannel on the other hand doesnt really complement my fair complexion. (Has more of a brown pull and would compliment a medium/darker skin tone) The product itself is u201cokayu201d, its not the best liquid matte lipstick that Ive tried and its not the worst. It has a really light sweet scent, which I personally enjoy. It glides onto the lips very easily. This matte lipstick holds a slight shine even after it dries. The doesnt feel heavy or tacky on the lips. It stays on for about 2 hours before I need reapply. My main complaint is that its shiny even after it dries. Both shades were like this! If youre a fan of Gwen, and you dont mind a shinier matte lipstick, you would probably love this but it just wouldnt be my go-to product since I prefer a more matte look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This matte liquid lipstick comes in such beautiful packaging and the shades Flannel (dusty rose) and Original Recipe (true red) are just gorgeous. The shade Original Recipe is just perfect for creating that statement red Gwen Stefani lip look and the Flannel is such a beautiful shade to create a natural lip look. This lipstick applies so smoothly and provides long-lasting matte color to my lips without drying out my lips.  It has a nice pleasant scent. The color is so nicely pigmented and it feels very lightweight on my lips without any sticky feeling. The applicator makes it easy to apply the lipstick precisely. The lipstick does transfer a little when I touch my lips. I love the beautiful matte finish and would definitely recommend this lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a freelance makeup artist for over 10 years and a person who has been obsessing about makeup and I cant go out without makeup on, I highly recommend GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick. I must put my lipstick on everyday because My lips are too pale. I like the texture of this liquid lipstick . It is a weightless liquid lipstick. I love the finish as it is ultra-matte. After blending, the color is even and highly pigmented. It gives you a matte finish. And I love that its mask proof, no fading, feathering, or transferring. You can create different looks with just one lipstick, if you put a little bit and blend it out, the color would be natural and good for everyday use. If you want it bold, just apply it all over your lips, it would be good for any special night event.

reviews.review_title: This red shade was very rich and pigmented!
reviews.review_text: As Makeup Artist & Skincare Specialist, I always look forward to trying new beauty products. I was recently given the opportunity to try GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick by Gwen Stefani. This lipstick looked very interesting. I was excited to try this shade of Original Recipe a True Red! What really caught my eye is that this liquid lipstick was designed to not fade or even feather. I have thin lips so I was ready to give it a try to amp them up. So I tried the liquid lipstick and it went on very smooth. My lips did not feel dry they felt comfortable. Unbelievable, my lips definitely amped up in color and in size. The red shade was very rich, a high pigment shade. It is a nice matte liquid lipstick with staying power!

reviews.review_title: A Good Long Wear Lip Color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good longwear matte lip color and was excited to try this one by Gxve Cosmetics. I am always busy on the go and enjoy a good lip color where I don't have to touch up during the day. I was really impressed by the formula because it stayed in place all day during my work and through eating and drinking. The formula didn't dry my lips out and felt good. The pigments are also very bold which I like and be used anytime I want a nice pop of color. I really enjoyed this formula along with there nice color selection. I also want to mention that the formula glided well onto my lips without pulling and it was easy to take along with me at work. I would highly recommend this formula to anyone who is looking for a good longwear matte lip, it is really good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is exactly as shown, just not flattering for me. I think this is a solid choice for a liquid lipstick. It wasn't too dry. The color wasn't great for my skin tone, and I realized I don't like matte lips on myself anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im excited to have dived into this liquid matte lipstick from the brand. Typically, I am a Fenty stan when it comes to rocking a flawless matte lip. Yet, the GIVE brand has me wholly floored! I must be careful when I use matte lipsticks as many of them dry up my lips, and the color will start to peel off. However, the formula of this product comes in a sassy, chic tube with a soft doe applicator so I can control the amount of color I want to add to my pout. This lipstick lives by its name as it is very lightweight and long-lasting, although I can remove it with some micellar wateru2026takes it off quickly.  This product delivers a phenomenal range of shades, but the one that stands out for me is the Original Recipeu201d which is Gwen Stefanis signature red that I love. She mastered the perfect bright red that is compatible with several skin tones. It is a significant red to wear dailyu2026it gives my pout the glamorous feel I am asking for. The first time I wore this lip product, I received numerous compliments for the beautiful red shade. Also, the application is it goes creamy but will dry into a bold matte. There will be no need to layer it as it is highly pigmented enough to apply one swipe onto the lips. It stays in place throughout my long days (drinking and eating) until I need to remove it at night. I know when I am wearing a matte lip, I forget that I have it on until I catch a look in the mirror, pleased by how intact the color still appears. Now, that is a good lipstick. It is not heavy, not tacky, no fading, no feathering, and comfortable to wear daily. I see this product as a game-changer and a must-have in lip products.

reviews.review_title: absolutely the best liquid lipstick on the market!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing this is my first makeup review!! Okk ever since KVD changed their formula and packaging I have been unable to find a perfect matte liquid lipstick, until now! I have medium olive skin and Anastasia and KVD's new formula mauve colors are just too light, and other brands are just not the right shade of mauve (like the Huda beauty which also takes forever to dry and gets everywhere like lipgloss until then).   But finally, cowgirl is absolutely perfect for medium tan olive skin! and its soo perfectly matte and dries right away without drying the lips or looking flaky or blotchy. Its so silky looking and when I touch it with my finger, absolutely nothing is transferred. I havent tried with food but I have a feeling that it will stay on even after eating. I am sooooo happy!!! I never thought a musician would make amazing makeup but then again Gwen Stefani was always the queen of the red lips so it makes sense

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors. Goes on very bright its not drying. I like to use this with a lip pencil. I like how it glides on my lips. it's definitely a great lip product. I also find its not to shinny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Gwen Stefani original recipe liquid lipstick is gorgeous! Not only is the packaging a slay but it smells so delicious. The shade is a true red lipstick, that true statement look.  The formula dries matte but isnt drying to the lips. The applicator was the perfect shape for a liquid lipstick. So the lipstick does transfer when touching but its very minimal. This doesnt bother me too much because when removing its not something you have to scrub to get off. The formula is so great it really was longwear I only touched up once after I was done eating! This formula was very buttery when applying. This is gonna be my new go to red shade! I would definitely recommend trying out the u201cIm Still Here Longwear Clean Matte Liquid Lipsticku201d it wont disappoint.

reviews.review_text: I got the true red to test it out! And I love it stays in place all day no matter what you do! Definitely recommend if you want a liquid lipstick. Like the scent of the product. Packaging is beautiful. Definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Pretty but not a must have for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a licensed esthetician and makeup is a passion of mine. Liquid lipsticks are almost always my go to, especially if I have a long work day, because I hate having to reapply constantly. I don't hate this lipstick but it isn't quite my favorite, I wish that it was completely transfer proof but I does smear if you are not careful. I also found it to be a little drying, which isn't unusual for a liquid lipstick but I do appreciate when they aren't going anywhere! The smell is lovely, and the packaging is beautiful. The shades are stunning. I tried Flannel and Original Recipe and I love both of the colors. Overall I wouldn't recommend this to someone that is looking for something that is 100% kiss or transfer proof, or to anyone that has dry or peeling lips. They are beautiful but probably will not be my go to.

reviews.review_title: GXVE Im Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE's I'm Still Here High-Performance Matte Liquid Lipstick is an absolute game-changer! From the moment I applied it, I was impressed by its velvety texture and how smoothly it glided on my lips. The pigmentation is outstanding, providing a bold and vibrant color that lasted throughout the day without any fading. What truly sets it apart is the lightweight feel u2013 it's so comfortable, I often forget I'm wearing it. The matte finish is impeccable, giving a modern and sophisticated look. The longevity and transfer-proof formula make it perfect for all-day wear, and I've received countless compliments on its stunning shade Original Recipe. Kudos to Gwen Stefani for creating a matte lipstick that not only delivers on performance but also enhances my confidence. I'm definitely making this a staple in my beauty routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a professional Makeup artist cosmetologist and skincare enthusiast. I'm always checking out new brands and finding what I love for not only my personal kit, but for my professional make up kit as well. GXVE beauty was a brand. I couldn't wait to get my hands on and I'm so excited. I got to try out these mat lipsticks. I can say they are Kara approved and I can't wait to add these into my bridal kit. These are very high pigmented lipsticks that leave the lips coated with color. I really enjoyed the two colors that I received. It truly is 24 hour where. It passed the wear test of eating, and just going throughout the day with this lipstick on, and totally passed the test. It was still on my lips before I took a shower later in the night. Really excited to try out more products from GXVE because these really beat my expectations.

reviews.review_text: Longest lasting liquid lipstick I own and it doesnt transfer. It also did not dry my lips out like a normal liquid lipstick would. Definitely my favourite liquid lipstick formula Ive tried.

I love the true red color And how it dries from wet to dry Matt in 30 seconds. Definitely getting another color. ufffc

reviews.review_title: An absolute must have lipstick for your collectio!

reviews.review_text: I am a lipstick junkie. I have hundreds of lipsticks of all shades and formulas. This is by far top 3 for me. I wanted Original Recipe but it was sold out. So I opted for Cowgirl. Insanely beautiful shade. The first time I wore it for 6 or 7 hours. No touch ups at all and color never faded or dried my lips out. This was a huge plus for me. I have wore it 10 hours comfortably. I did realize after a really long and hectic day it never dried out my lips, but I did get darker with extremely long wear. Which is not a complaint at all. I wouldn't expect it to wear as long as it does. I will be definitely repurchase and buy other shades. If you are looking for exceptionally long wear without drying your lips out give this one a shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this lipstick out. I'm going to start off by saying the scent is horrible! I love sweet vanilla scents, and this wasn't that type or scent. This smells like if you left butter out for too long and mixed sugar in with it. I can't get past the scent when putting it on it that strong. Next, I'd say this makes your lips look dried out even if they don't feel it. The color I got was cowgirl, and it was pretty when putting it on, but when it dried... it was dark plum almost on me. I wear mauve lipstick mostly, and this wasn't mauve to me. The only thing about this lipstick I love is the staying power i wore it while drinking and eating, and it lasted. I gave it 2 stars for that, but overall, I probably won't buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would say I have tried over 30 red lipsticks in the past two years: high-end to drugstore brands; mostly liquids. After all that, this is absolutely one of my top three, and here's why: Yesterday, I put it on at about 7:30am -- no liner. I went to work and drank water and tea. I ate salad with a balsamic dressing   (oily!). I ate meatballs and corn fritters, and drank Thai iced tea and ginger beer for dinner. I went to a show until about 11:30pm. I DID NOT RE-APPLY ONCE. Yes, by the end of that day, it was drying. It had worn off a little on the inside my lips, and bled just a tiny bit on the edges (again -- no liner). But other than that, it looked amazing. I'd say 8/10 status after over TWELVE hours, including two real meals.

reviews.review_text: The OG True Red is gorgeous. Reds scare me cause I have pink undertones, but this is so beautiful. I have a few shades of the matte colors and they are great, long-wearing colors. Not overly drying, goes on so smoothly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Tomboy lipstick has quickly become a staple in my makeup collection, and for good reason. First and foremost, the sweet rose flavor and scent are simply delightful. It adds a subtle, pleasant touch to the application process that I genuinely look forward to each time I use it.  One of the standout features of this lipstick is its lightweight formula. It glides on effortlessly, and you barely feel like you're wearing lipstick at all. This is particularly important for me when I'm on the go, such as when I'm picking up my baby from daycare. I need a lipstick that's comfortable and long-lasting, and this one certainly fits the bill.  The matte finish of the GXVE Tomboy lipstick is spot-on. It offers a velvety, non-shiny look that's perfect for both casual and more formal occasions. I've found that it stays put for hours without the need for constant touch-ups, which is a big plus for busy moms like myself.  What I really appreciate is how easily it applies. The lipstick's design allows for precise application without the need for a lip liner. The color payoff is fantastic, and it gives my lips a beautifully defined and even look.   Another fantastic aspect of this lipstick is its versatility. The shade seems to complement a wide range of skin tones, making it suitable for many different people. It's become my go-to choice for both everyday wear and special occasions.  Perhaps the best part is the compliments I receive when wearing this lipstick. It seems to be universally appealing, and I often get asked what I'm wearing. It's a fantastic confidence boost to know that this lipstick not only looks great but also draws positive attention.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful MLBB color; comfortable matte finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very happy to see GXVE expand their line of liquid lipsticks. I'm not usually a fan of liquid lipsticks because of how drying they can be, but recent formulations seem to be less drying, including the ones from the GXVE I'm Still Here range. Flannel is my third lipstick from this line; the first I received as gratis and the second & this third I purchased myself based on how well the first one performed. This is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  WHAT I LIKE: * The shade Flannel is my favorite of this series - it's a pigmented, slightly deeper and bolder my-lips-but-better shade * Color is vibrant and rich * Lightweight feel * No need for a lip liner * Dries down quickly & wears comfortably, for the most part (but, as to be expected from a liquid lipstick, it is drying but not nearly as drying as other formulations) * Longwearing (but see below) - this holds up for most of the day, longer if I'm very careful about eating and limit my drinks during the day.  * Leaves a pretty stain to the lips as it wears down  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * It claims to be transfer-proof, but it is not. It will transfer onto cups, silverware, etc. The most transfer-proof shade in this group is Original Recipe. The other colors I've tried transfer much more easily and quickly.    FYI: * Full coverage * Matte finish (but doesn't feel too drying on the lips) * The shade Flanne is a gorgeous, slightly smoky rose-and-mauve my-lips-but-better shade.  * Of all her lipstick lines, this one is the standout for me. I'm not typically a liquid lipstick wearing gal but the ones in the I'm Still Here collection stand out to me for their formulation (not as drying as other liquid lipsticks) and wearability.  * Vegan * Cruelty-free  BUY, BUY, BUY ud83dudecd or BYE-BYE ud83dudc4b?:  * Even though it's not completely transfer-proof, it does have a good staying power and is one of the more comfortable liquid lipsticks I've worn. A BUY, BUY, BUY ud83dudecd for me.

reviews.review_title: Vibrant, long-wearing color but not transfer proof
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: his is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  WHAT I LIKE: * Rich, pigmented color * Lightweight  * No need for a lip liner * Wears comfortably, for the most part (but, as to be expected from a liquid lipstick, it is slightly drying) * Color is long-wearing - while there was some transfer onto my coffee cup and my utensils at lunch, the color did last for quite some time and even lasted through a plate of BBQ!   AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * The shade Original Recipe lived up to its transfer proof claims. This shade Cowgirl, did not. Would like to see more consistency with the transfer proof claims. That said, even though Cowgirl did transfer, it didn't wear off completely.   FYI: * Full coverage * Matte finish (but doesn't feel overly drying on the lips) * The description mauve pink is appropriate for the shade Cowgirl * Vegan * Cruelty-free  BUY, BUY, BUY ud83dudecd or BYE-BYE ud83dudc4b?:  * I'm not usually into liquid lipsticks but I quite like this line of liquid lipsticks from GXVE and would consider the product one to BUY, BUY, BUY! ud83dudecd

reviews.review_text: Performance is way better than expected.  You can apply it thin, it dries quickly, did not feather hours later (I'm 47 with plenty of channeling), did not flake and is not drying at all. My only complaint is the smell -  its like cake batter - and while nostalgia is part of the line, Easy Bake Oven is over the top for me.  Also - Fishnets is underrated -  its equal parts bright and deep, which is a hard for a balance for a liquid lip color to strike and it leans red, not pink.  Its a one note color but I'm glad to have it in my collection. especially at this price point.  I wear it more than I thought I would.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Liquid lipsticks are typically a formula I steer away from. Dont get me wrong, I love the idea of a long wearing lipstick but the drying effect isnt something that my already dry lips finds appealing. So I had some mixed feelings about this one when I received it as part of a gratis package. Turns out, I had nothing to be apprehensive about. This is my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.   Original Me, a blue-based red in the Im Still liquid lipstick line is stunning - a true neutral red that seems to flatter many, many complexions. Reds give me some pause as I often find them turning fuschia on my lips. Not so with this beauty from GXVE by Gwen Stefani. This one goes on red and stays red. It also stays put. Through a 20-minute walk to and from the coffee shop with my Covid mask on; a ramen meal; and multiple glasses of water. It also wears comfortably and does not leave my lips feeling dry. A downside for me at least, is that it can bleed a little upon application and I find I need to use a lip liner. Other than that (and thats a minor downside), this is really a perfect red liquid lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this product as it is the first time Ive ever tried any product from this brand! I love lip colors, especially reds and nudes. This product is very easy to apply, and layer are well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really impressed with this liquid lipstick! Its a beautiful true blue red. The perfect blue red. The colour is just beautiful and its extremely pigmented. The formula feels comfortable. Liquid lipsticks can be so hit and miss. I wore it today and it lasted over 8 hours, drinking coffee all day and going on a few smoke breaks. I am definitely going to grab the berry shade and I am hoping she will add more shades to this line, they are fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really great liquid lipstick that lasts at least 12 hours on me. Beautiful shade and glides so easily onto my lips. Doesn't dry them out at all, and I love the packaging. It screams Gwen with how elegant and fun the packaging is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this liquid lip!!! I was so excited when I saw Gwens line, her lips always look beautiful so I purchased it and I gave it a fair wear test! I put it on with lip liner this morning and it looked beautiful, felt light weight, I was excited!! I love the colour, its the perfect shade of red and I feel it would look gorgeous on all skin tones however, almost right away, I noticed it was coming off when I took a sip of water and then it started to feather at the edges within a couple hours! It does not hold up with eating and drinking, it continued to come off on everything so I tried to reapply it and let it dry again. I put a mask on today and went about my business for the day, the second photo is what my lips looked like after taking my mask off. For a product that claims to be long wearing and budge proof, this did not hold true to its claims at all for me unfortunately:( and then it got crumbly and dry after a period of time.  I wear the Kylie liquid lips and have never had a problem, you can eat, drink, wear a mask if you are a mask wearer, go about your business without any issues and it doesnt feel like there is anything on your lips! For all the makeup I have purchased and tried (which is a lot!!!), I have never really felt compelled to review a product (even the great ones- I just continue to repurchase!) but I was honestly just shocked that this product claims to do all those things and it doesnt do a single one other then colour pay off! Others may have luck, but I wouldnt suggest this product at all unfortunately :(

reviews.review_text: This lipstick is SEXY! I first saw it on the site and to me it looked orangey red so I kind of hesitated in buying it. I went to the store and omg! She is sexy!! She smells sweet. She stays all day w little transfer and shes a true red. Im in love!

reviews.review_title: Not for the faint of heart!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who shies away from both liquid lipstick and a bold, red lip, this proved to be an interesting endeavor.   Initial thoughts: This is a lot of red. Rich, blazing bright blue-red. And yet, it somehow does not look out of place on my lips. The vanilla cake-batter scent is quite noticeable at first, although it quickly disappears once applied. The doe foot applicator is precise enough to allow me to go without liner, gliding on accurately and smoothly. Although it appears shiny and feels feathery soft at first, it quickly dries down. Once dry, it left my lips feeling slightly tacky. I could u2018feel it on my lips, and although it was not bothersome at first, I was not a fan of the dryness.  Two hours after applying, I checked the mirror to find everything still in place; no feathering. I had smudged a bit to the side from wearing a mask for a few minutes, which was quickly wiped off. I reapplied and within 10 minutes, my lips felt so uncomfortable from the settling of the product that I removed it. Despite the transfer to my cheek (and glass straw), it took some work to coax it off of my lips with micellar water.  Would I recommend? That depends. Im Still Here has great longevity and the shade seems to be universally flattering. If liquid matte lips are your thing, if you arent afraid of color, and you want a product that performs, then I would say yes. However, if they arent, good news! The line has two additional reds in satin and matte traditional bullet form that might be more appealing and wear more comfortably.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Quite impressed! Its lightweight, and very little colour transfer!  I like the fragrance.  Beautiful classic red colour. Its a matte lipstick that lives up to its name. Could feel drying for some but I dont really mind as I sometimes prefer a nice matte looking lipstick.

reviews.review_title: non transferable? budgeproof? No. Not even close!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: where to begin. (Well, first, see pictures below.) I wanted to love this lipstick. I really did! I'm 41 and grew up listening to No Doubt (back when they made good music) and always wanted the ruby red lips Gwen sported. So when I saw this...?!?! I was practically giddy. I love makeup but when it comes to lipstick I HAVE to have a true long wear. The best for me, is Covergirls Outlast which doesn't dry out my lips and literally wears all day. it's amazing. So before buying this, I asked how this compared strictly in regards to long wear/non transferability. the answers I received were about the same. each said it lasted all day. was put on before work and lasted thru meals and still looked good 10 hours later. YES! I couldn't order it fast enough. So today was the day I got my soon to be best friend. I ran to the bathroom, took the lipstick out of the box, and smiled as I started to unscrew the golden cap. I was a little surprised, when I started pulling the lipstick out, at the quasi fruity and not in a good way, yet oddly familiar smell. *In the hunt for the perfect lipstick, I've tried a lot! of different brands...including my most recent purchase...from dollar general! made by Maybelline. It's called Sensational Liquid Matte. It smells exactly the same, but actually held up as opposed to Gwen's, and cost me 5 bucks I think. Anywho, I started to apply the lipstick and almost immediately the smell went away, so that was a plus. Just as described, this lipstick feels weightless, and is packed with high payoff color that felt really nice and not dry on my lips. I blotted (just a light lip mark on the tissue, otherwise it was all still fully saturated on my lips). i was pretty happy at the match with my skintone. so I left for dinner. let's just say the whole, non transferable, budgeproof, no feathering, whatever other longwear claims that were made...didnt ring true for me. I used the bathroom after dinner and was embarrassed at my lips! see pic below. literally...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was hoping to love this product and had high expectations it would replace my current fav red longwear. Unfortunately after the first wear, I doubt I will repurchase. The colour is gorgeous on application. I did find it lightened and the richness faded throughout the day. I trialed this lipstick working from home. After a few hours, it bled above the lip line and around the corners of my mouth. It is not transfer proof and will come off onto your hand or a napkin if you touch your lips. I personally dont mind the smell, but compare it to the Huda liquid lips. If you dont like that scent I dont think youll like this. I did like the weight and look / feel of the packaging but the formula needs work in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I own about 5 red liquid lipsticks and they all seem to transfer when I eat or drink ! This by far has to be my favorite !!!!! It does not transfer or stain ! I love it !! Cant wait to keep using it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its definitely long lasting and the perfect shade of red! Ive gotten a lot of compliments while using this matte listick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always searching for the perfect red and I loved this.   I'm middle eastern and have an olive complexion and I loved the intensity of this color.  it lasted a while but it did not transfer when I drank so that was good bur when I went to rinse my mouth out, it did bleed.  But it did last and fade a bit.  The only other issue I had was it was so dry.  I know that's expected of mattes but I was hoping it wouldn't.   All in all I loved the color and would still wear it.  I'm going to try the lipstick and see if thats better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is a strong smell at first but did not last long. The application was very slippery. The color is beautiful, but it only lasted about 4 hours before it started to feather and fade. Very little transfer. It did dry down a lot on me, but I like the dryer lipsticks. These are my honest opinions as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador and I did receive this as a gratis from Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick have a beautiful shade of red , it will transfer i got to use it a few times and it will not stay on if you drink or eat it does not have the stay power of  Anastasia or stila liquid lipsticks, it has a scent of like brown sugar or caramel but it will fade i give it 4 stars because it transfer but I like this product way better than her eye shadow palette dont bother with those to dry and to much fall out and no pigment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try this as a Sephora Community Ambassador and a bold, red lip is definitely outside of my comfort zone! However, if I'm going to wear red I definitely I want a lipstick that's going to last and not smudge all over the place. This formula is fabulous.  I was honestly shocked at the ease of application, the wear time, and even the slightly pleasant scent.  It also wasn't nearly as drying as I expected it to be for a liquid lipstick.  I would totally recommend this as a fabulous red lip to add to one's collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  I usually stay away from liquid lipsticks as I find them really drying on the lips.  This one surprised me at how comfortable it was to wear.  I didnt feel my lips dry while wearing it at all.  I could easily wear it for hours without wanting to take it off.  Bonus that it held up well throughout the day without having to constantly touch it up.  The color is the most beautiful vibrant red lipstick that I have ever owned that looks perfect on my skin tone.  Although, it states it is a matte liquid lipstick, I felt it dried down to a semi matte since there is a sheen to it but not glossy.  I did pair it with PMG lip liner in Blood Lust but honestly felt that you didnt need a lip liner at all.  The applicator made it so easy for you to outline your lips and fill in.  Even though it states it is budge proof, I did find it to transfer a bit but had great staying power.  A drawback for some would be that it is scented but it didnt bother me.  I am hoping Gwen adds more colors in this line because her liquid lipstick so far is amazing and the packaging is so on point with the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best red liquid lipsticks Ive ever used. The formula is smooth, long lasting and non drying. It layers well with other lipsticks and glosses (try topping it with Fentys Lemon Lava gloss) too. Im already planning to grab GXVEs lipstick formulas!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formula of this liquid lip, and I hope the brand comes out with some additional shades. I enjoy the packaging and find it to be very lovely and unique. I also like the shape of the wand, which makes it easy to apply. The formula is very comfortable to wear, and it never felt dry. I didn't think it was completely transfer proof, but it stayed on my lips for a good 6+ hours and while eating, drinking, etc. The original recipe/true red shade is vibrant and pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick! Non transferable but doesnt completely dry out my lips like so many others do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ONLY liquid lipstick that actually stays! No transfer on my coffee mug!! The color is beautiful and the lipstick smells divine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved red lipstick, but especially since I have stopped dying my hair. I have had a hard time finding that perfect red that looks good with my complexion. I have come close. I have spend a ton on different brands: Chanel, Tilbury, Fenty etc. But this is the one! It goes on well and is not overly drying like I thought it would be. Very long wearing. Almost no transfer. It can get caky in the center of my lips depending on they day. I can add a little tinted vaseline to the center and it still stays on all day! Photo was taken at the end of a long day of walking outside and eating two meals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dries down quickly very lightweight. No transfer to glass and very little wear off while eating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shade of red I believe can flatter any skin tone; you may not be comfortable wearing such a bold hue but I believe this blue toned red will flatter everyone.  I found the wand of the applicator to be small, which made lining the lips, then filling them in very easy. You have about 15-20 seconds before it fully dries down to correct any errors.  There is a strong, sickly sweet vanilla type scent to the lippie that made it almost unbearable for me.  I had worn my hair down and was caught in a gust of wind where my hair blew across my lips and I was embarrassed to find bold red lines where my hair dragged across my face. So needless to say, even after drying, this liquid lip is not transfer proof.  I received this item from Sephora as gratis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, but only suitable for pics, not for an all day look.  The color easily transfers and is difficult to remove unless you have makeup removal wipes/solution.  I wanted to love this product but I cant put it on and feel confident eating or drinking.  I wore it to lunch and when I noticed it was getting on my hands, I tried to wipe it off and it was everywhere.  My husband looked at me and asked if my lips were bleeding.  I used a cheap balm to rehydrate my lips (thats another problem: very drying), then I was able to wipe it off completely.  Again, its great for pictures but Id never leave my house again while wearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best liquid lip Ive ever tried. Transfer proof, colour lasts all day, no need to reapply. Also, it smells like Rice Krispie treats so thats an added bonus. Cannot recommend this highly enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this one - the red is not only well pigmented, but also very flattering. The applicator made it easy to line and fill lips, and it lasted through a quesadilla dinner without that blurred edges that often come with a bright red. While it was initially drying down, it felt like it might dry my lips, but it didn't - as long as I use something to prep, I think it'll be just fine!  The only downside (and why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars was the smell. It was sweet, almost like fake cake batter, and VERY strong. Luckily, after 30min or so, the smell had gone, otherwise I don't think I could have worn it. (I will continue to wear it despite the smell, but would love to see that lessened in the future)

reviews.review_title: Great Liquid Lipstick and gorgeous red
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. I was sent this palette from @TeamBIC and GXVE, Thank you so much!  For reference, I am 44 years old and have wrinkly aging lips.  I am including a picture of all red lipsticks I have at this point (I have an obsession, I knowu2026)  PROS: - I love that all the collection come in clean, modern, chic looking recycled cardboard boxes that have a gorgeous design inside. - It is a clean at Sephora brand, cruelty free, vegan, and with recyclable packaging. - The packaging is so beautiful! I find it elegant and chic. It is not too light but not heavy either. It closes with a click, not magnetic. - It is a liquid formula, that feels velvety upon application, and very comfortable on the lips. It was not sticky or tacky. It was not drying and it lasted the whole day looking gorgeous.  - It is long lasting but not fully transfer-proof. It did transfer to my cup so I can imagine that it would transfer to my mask, but it did it so slightly, so I can consider it u201cenough transfer-proofu201d. Thats why I find it so comfortable, because it is not fully dry, which all non-transfer formulas are. - It is highly pigmented. - It doesnt bleed into lip lines and wrinkles. - It has a small applicator that it is easy to use for more precision.  - I find it rightly priced for the quality. CONS: - As I said, it is NOT transfer-free. It will slightly transfer to cups, loved ones, masksu2026 - It is a scented lipstick. I dont mind perfumed formulas, in fact I like them, but I find this one a little too overwhelming for my liking, but I like the lipstick performance so much that this doesnt change my rating of the product. But if you dont like scented formulas, stay away from this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Spells amazing and feels amazing and looks amazing 10/10 it does transfer but use setting spray and it stays on all day

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing true red lipstick! I highly recommend this lipstick I wore it for 10hrs at my job and it had little to no transfer and I didnt have to reapply it once and it didnt bleed. I stopped wearing red lipsticks because they always tend to bleed on me but this one did not! I ate and drank thru out the day day and it held up beautifully! 5 stars!

reviews.review_title: Stays all day and does not dry my lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gorgeous long-wear lipstick is just beautiful. The color is rich and pigmented. The feel is light weight but the color truly lasts.   I like that this lip color is super light but it really is a clean, long wear lip product. That is unique. It does not dry my lips either. I find it really lasts without transferring or fading. It applies smoothly and dries quickly down to a very matte finish. It stays all day. This is a very pretty classic red shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this color and I have a lot of red lipsticks.  Sephora signature liquid stick is usually my go to but this color is phenomenal. Its light weight, doesnt dry my lips out, isnt runny, and its a true toned red u2014 no orange undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great lipstick because it leaves my lips feeling so nice! I love how its lightweight and doesnt bother me while wearing it. I can tell that this color is very Gwen Stefani and I love wearing it.
