reviews.review_text: My new favorite liquid lipstick! I love lining my lips with the fine tip and then filling in the rest with the Doe foot applicator. It goes on smooth and dries down really nicely. Its very light weight and my lips dont dry out with this formula. The color is iconic Gwen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora beauty community ambassador and this is my honest and authentic review of this product. GORGEOUS product! the wand is great and helps line your lips. Very comfortable to wear, not extreme feel of drying. it does transfer but it's not as bad as others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely awesome. Truest red. Im a deep brown color so I muted it just a bit, but if youre lighter it is perfect. Kiss proof and long wear. New fave u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_text: Such a cute plump application. It has a nice color and its very colorful. The packaging is very slick and comes off the brush very easily. I used the red lip pie, I dont know if theres other colors it comes in.

reviews.review_text: It's a beautiful red that goes on smoothly. However, it is NOT longwearing - it never dries all the way, so it doesn't just transfer, it smears! It also smells strongly of artificial coconut, like suntan lotion. Still debating if it's staying or getting returned!
What a waste..this gets all over your skin and makes a mess! Its drying and made my lips look gross its not even true to color I hate it!

reviews.review_title: Not bright and vibrant like the photos
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It didnt look at all like the vibrant red in photos. On me (like Gwen I have light skin & platinum blonde hair) it was a dark crimson red. I ended up returning it because its not a summery bright red like I was hoping. Its also extremely matte, difficult to wash off but that could be a plus to some people.

reviews.review_title: Gwen Stefani Fan - and my thoughts.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was SO excited about Gwen Stefani coming out with make up! For someone who was inspired by her make up looks as a young girl (I loved her since No Doubt), sadly I was not impressed by this long wear clean matte lipstick.  First impressions: beautiful packaging, so Gwen. I love the black and white with pops of gold!  Opening the lipstick, the smell of it smells a little sweet.. not my favorite tbh. It also looks like it has a lipgloss applicator because its thick and the hairs on the brush stick out quite a bit (like a lip gloss applicator). Personally, I like something a little more stiff.  Color wise, the color is beautiful and sticks out a lot. This will be your bright brick red, than a deep universal red. Upon application: messy and thick, I really needed to work with my lip liner to help it look clean but it does bleed through and made it look choppy on the edges of lips after a while.  Longwear: I wore it to work, and about two hours in, it was already halfway off. Maybe from talking? Not sure but I had to reapply and when I did, the formula is just very very thick, I felt like my lips had chunks of dryness coming off. I wish I had an after picture because it was so chunky!  I will not be returning this product though, solely for the fact that its Gwen Stefani and I am a huge fan..  I will be trying the others, I have high hopes for those. Maybe just not on a day that Im going to work.  Will I recommend this product? No, to make up girls who KNOW what they like. But yes if youre a huge fan and want Gwens merch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this lippy. Its so light weight and goes on so smooth. The color is perfect and last a long time and doesnt make my lips feel dry like other Matte lipsticks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid lipstick leans warm and slightly orange red but is still passable as a neutral tone.  It smells like vanilla cupcake icing. Its easy to apply straight from the Doe foot applicator and feels light and airy on the lips.  I experienced no bleeding and the color remained smooth and opaque for the entire wear.  I did pre treat my lips with oil before applying it as my lips tend to get dry with liquid lipsticks in general so I knew to prep them well.   It does transfer.  It does stain my lips.  Upon removal my lips looked a sheer cherry red which looked wonderful with a clear coat of gloss over it.  You will definitely need a cleansing oil to remove it entirely.   I knocked off a star for it transferring (none of the liquid lipsticks I love dry down completely and Im fine with that but know this may be a deal breaker for some. All in all its a gorgeous and comfortable liquid lipstick.   The bottom swatch to the left is the liquid lipstick.  ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best red matte lip Ive ever had!! And Ive tried ALOT. Use a light amount of chapstick underneath and wait for this lipstick to dry on top and its the best. Minimal transfer, especially when eating!! Drinking wine, it did not even transfer to the cup. It was absolutely perfect and the color is the red Ive been looking for forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to like this lipgloss. Firstly, it's drying so I put another gloss over it & it felt better. Also, the color is so bright, hence I used a nude color over it. The worst is when I ate. It got all over the outside of my lips. Embarrassing! With all of the great reviews, I did not expect this. I would not recommend this! And to think I almost bought one for a friend!! Oh God!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like Gwen's matte lipstick bullet much better than her Clean Matte Liquid lipstick.   While it is a beautiful shade, there are some drawbacks- or maybe I just don't care for liquid lipsticks in general. Pros *Absolutely beautiful shade of red, although it is more warm toned than the lipstick. *Applies evenly and you can use the tip of the doe foot applicator to line the lips  Cons *Never really dries down and become one with the lips *Transfers.  Not so much when I blotted with a tissue immediately after application, but it does come off on cups, etc. and it does smear.   Can be messy. *The color is a bit different than the lipstick- it is warmer (may not be a con, but worth mentioning) *The color wears off in a way typical of liquid lipsticks- in the center of the lips.  This was the biggest deal breaker for me.  I am sure there are better liquid lip formulas out there.  This was a miss for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: feels nice and light going on, very pigmented but it's drying. I did return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I work at a hospital and I was giddy to wear my Im still here longwear lipstick, only had it on for two hours pulled down my mask to see how it was wearing and it was smeared all over my chin and upper lip I looked like the joker from Batman, this is definitely not recommended if you wear a mask as it will smear smudge and feather.  I will have to trial it over the weekend to see how it wears without a mask all day through eating, drinking, I will update.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first I was hesitant to order this solely because so many celebrities are coming out with a cosmetic line that it's becoming too much for me. However the staged images won me over and I ordered. Instantly I fell in love when I opened the tube and it smelt like buttercream icing. Today is the first time I've used it but so far it seems to stay on well, even after I kissed my husband goodbye, he had zero traces on him. It hadn't made my lips feel dry which is a plus because most matte lips do even when they claim they don't. Even if it turns out to not last long I'm still gonna be happy because I'm a child and love the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lipstick. Its long lasting, easy to use and smells delicious! I will definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this gorgeous color! Such a different look for me them normal but this product was great. You dont even need to coats the color shoes perfect on my skin tone and makes my lips pop perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful red! The packaging is cute, I was expecting more from Gwen but the overall product is really nice. Its pigmented and not heavy. Minimal  cracking and I only reapplied once throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try, and I enjoy it! I LOVE the packaging as its very reminiscent of Gwen Stefani and her style. The color is beautiful and the smell is pleasant without being too strong. The formula is pretty good. Not the best Ive tried but it stays on very well and isnt too drying! Definitely will wear again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does not dry our your lips! The color is insanely beautiful! This will be my go to red lip. It does come off a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love , love this lipstick!!! amazing color /stays on for long time i tried many longwear this is #1

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just get that satin or matte lipstick formula. This scent smells like a combo of coconut and vanilla, which normally I like but the coconut in this smells like buttered popcorn which is a little off putting to put on my lips. While the formula is beautiful and the color is pretty I would much more recommend one of the other two formulas because they dont smell nearly as strong. And the scent has a coconut smell which I know a lot of people are allergic to nuts/coconuts. So. User beware if you have not allergies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the red color, but does transfer and is not mask proof. I first tried it with a lip liner and thought maybe it was the liner that was the problem. I then tried it by itself and it still smeared with the mask. I say if you are not planning on wearing a mask at all then this is a great liquid lipstick that dries matte and it does wear for a long time with minimal re-application. Do not recommend if you are a mask wearer or if you are planning any sexy activities since it does smear and transfers.. if you know what I mean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way it goes on and drys but its Not loungewear it fades away as you go through out your day and i had to reapply it! But other than that it would have been perfect if it was longwear!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! She definitely did her thing with this!!! Stay on all day doesnt dry out your lips!! Does transfer a little. Best red matte Ive purchased so far!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased one of everything from the initial release as Gwen has been my idol/girl crush for 20+ years. This was hands down the best product in the line. The color is perfection and dried down to a comfortable, not too drying matte. As for long wear, this did NOT budge through eating and drinking. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula! Super lightweight and long lasting yet did not dry out my lips. Literally felt like I was wearing nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the lightweight and long-wearing formula with very little transfer even after eating! Such a pretty shade and amazing scent! The applicator makes it easy to apply also!! Definitely a thumbs up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Everything about this is perfect except for the gaudy white writing on the packaging.  The applicator made it easy to make crisp, clean lines.  Its super pigmented and is definitely one swipe color.  It does have a heavy cupcake scent that I do appreciate.  The formula feels like velvet on the lips. I really enjoyed this and would love if she made other shades in this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it's an amazing ride colour I believe it should suit everyone and it's a nice Matt so soft and won't dry out your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Realy like this lipstick! Its not sticky at all and applies evenly. Would reccomend applying with some sort of gloss of lip moisturizer unless you want the very matte finish. Overall would reccomend - color is perfect shade of red

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A M A Z I N G!!  Im a huge red lipstick Fanatic and when I heard that Gwen was starting her make up line I just had to get my hands on these. This liquid lipstick is like no other red  it goes on smooth and last all day.  It is absolutely stunning.  I LOVE YOU GWEN

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a staple in my makeup bag to give my makeup look a vibrant bold red lip. Its long lasting, doesnt feather and goes on my lips smooth without over drying my lips. I will definitely keep purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing color and texture, but does transfer a little bit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE it!!! Love the scent and it's long lasting and does NOT feel dry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I was looking for a really nice red with blue undertones! It applies so smooth and dries quickly, BUT the smell is SO strong.   Now it does smell good, but I feel like it would have been better with 50% less of the fragrance.  Definitely recommend if you would like a really longwear colour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is now my favorite red lipstick! Its so hard for me to find a red shade that complements my dark skin, but it truly is a universal red and looks amazing on me! I love how this formula stays in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not transfer proof BUT the color is amazing and extremely pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful. I love the way it applies to my lips . Very smooth velvety formula ,high pigment , gorgeous color payoff, and buildable.  It's super long-lasting and kisses proof.  Amazing!!! It also smells delicious.  Obsessed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is iconic! Perfect bold lip for a date night. The application went on really smooth and I was super impressed at the fact that the color does stay vibrant. However I did see a little transfer after application. Maybe if I would have put two coats that wouldnt have happened tho!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing formula and honestly Im surprised because I tend to stay away from Ted lip glosses since I always end up looking like the joker after a while but I am obsessed with the pigmentation of this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is the perfect long lasting matte RED liquid lipstick!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colour of this lipstick. Smells sweet like vanilla frosting! What I liked most about this lipstick is for a matte it did NOT dry out my lips! There was a slight transfer of product when I did a kiss test but lips still looked nice! Packaging for this is cute too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its lightweight, BEAUTIFUL BRIGHT RED! Its not orange, its not a dark blue red, Id say its a perfect mix of both and universal. It is pretty long wearing, but not completely transfer or smudge proof. But! Id say it stays on pretty dang well unless youre eating a greasy hamburger or something.

reviews.review_title: Best liquid lipstick Ive tried (and its A LOT)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been waiting for Gwen to come out with a makeup line for so long and I was so excited when this came out! I can honestly say (and not just because I love Gwen), in my opinion, this is absolutely the best liquid lipstick Ive tried! And Ive tried A LOT of them, probably most out there lol. I would say it feels similar to the Fenty one and is just as comfortable, but unlike Fenty it does not transfer (Fenty is one of my favorites, dont get me wrong!). It has the staying power of KVD but isnt drying and it doesnt pill in the corners. It lasted all day under a humid mask in humid Florida while I worked and even after I ate. It did not feather, bleed, or transfer, and it stayed comfortable all day almost as if I had just applied it. I didnt even touch it up all day. I highly recommend this lipstick! The color is also perfect. I am a red lipstick lover and have way too many shades lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love liquid lipsticks for a more intense look that lasts longer than a normal lipstick. This is so so pigmented and not patchy at all. The applicator is also so nice and so easy to create a precise look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping I would love this formula and color and I do! It's total perfection. The perfect true red. Isn't drying and doesn't highlight all your lip creases (over 40!). And it is actually transferproof! I cannot believe it. Looking forward to more colors to come! You did it Gwen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not all reds look good on my skin tone. Im a huge Gwen Stefani fan so I decided I was going to give this a try because the product looked like it would be good on any skin tone. I love the way this looks on my skin tone. I was worried when I first put it on that it was not going to look good but when it dried it was fabulous. This will definitely become a permanent color  in my rotation. A good read is hard to find.

reviews.review_title: Bleeds Onto the Skin Around Lips, Drying Formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely ever jump the gun and purchase something upon it's release, but I was SO excited about GXVE, and to get a new shade of red lip, that I did.  I am pretty bummed.  The color is gorgeous, but the formula missed the mark.  It goes on thick, and ends up everywhere before it sets.  It sits on the lips instead of becoming part of them, and let me talk about the bleeding onto the skin around the lips.  Really bad.  I am so sad that this just did not work for me.  I hope the regular lipstick might be better, but I am going to wait a while to order (this was very pricey for my budget, but I treated myself for my birthday).  :-(   I will try it with a different applicator and see if it helps, I do not want to give up on it, yet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really lightweight liquid lipstick. It actually doesnt look too drying on the lips and I have found it to be very long wearing. The red is a beautiful not too bright red. Its a good neutral, I dont find it too warm or too cool so I think it would suit a lot of skin tones. Im enjoying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: incredible staying power. beautiful true classic Hollywood red. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is a beautiful color and texture but its not transfer proof.  It definitely never completely dries.  I am a singer so I need something that wont budge with a microphone and this was disappointing for that reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looove this matte red lip!! While Im typically over the Matte Liquid Lipstick vibes these days this once is really nice. It is a gorgeous warm red that is ultra comfortable to wear. It doesnt dry down completely but I think that helps keep your lips hydrated and nourished. It has a delicious vanilla scent and ultra rich and gorgeous pigment. The packaging is a nice sleek compact that is high quality. Im definitely going to be reaching for this often!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect red. A WOC must have. This is a comfy matte. And pops without a beat face. I am going to re-up and its better than you know who

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous and bright red color!!  Not a huge fan of matte lipsticks normally, but I really like this one. Its smells like cake batter and not all chemically like others I have tried. The color payload is so strong that I only need one simple swab, so it feels like I'm wearing nothing! Dries down well, and I only found it to transfer when eating or drinking. Hubby normally doesn't let me kiss him while wearing bright colors lipstick for fear of transfer, but he likes this one. Would love to try other colors later on as the line grows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #gifted  I love the  clean formula of this liquid lipstick. The color has staying power and no fading, feathering, or transferring.  I love the matte finish and the red shade. The packaging is beautiful also. I was gifted this for the purpose of reviewing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a lipstick lover and I'm always looking for a long lasting liquid lipstick. This one applies smoothly and lasts for a pretty decent amount of time. The color is a perfect true tone red and doesn't dry out my lips. All in all it's a good lip product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love trying new red lipsticks and this is the perfect blue toned red!! Super flattering and makes my teeth look white. The formula is great too, longwearing and doesnt smear or crumble off. The applicator makes it easy to get precise lines without lip liner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shade, texture, doe foot applicator and scent. It wears well and doesnt transfer. About mid-day it started to wear off in the center of my lips, which most liquid lipsticks do, so this wasnt any better or worse. If you are like me, and dont love to reapply, Dose of Colors liquid lipstick in Kiss of Fire is my holy grail. I wont return this product but probably wouldnt purchase instead of anything else. That being said, depending on the colors and new releases in the future, Im sure Ill buy again because Gwen is perfect and Ill support her forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hate! Wanted to love, but its awful. I bought this as soon as I heard about it.  Its thick, tastes terrible, and hard to apply. My lips feel super dry. Ive only had it on for 60 minutes, but I cant stand the feeling of it. Also, the smell is so strong. Smells like weird cake batter. Its also not smudge proof, and comes off everywhere. So disappointed.

reviews.review_title: The best of the best, truly.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay... I got this today, I put it on this morning, it doesn't feel like there is anything on my lips at all, the applicator is nice and easy to use. Perfect shade of red.  Didn't fade or smudge AT ALL after eating an olive oil salad.... I was literally shook.  This is the best of the best.  My new go-to iconic red lipstick.  10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This branding is sooo on point!!  The very minimal packaging is all recyclable, the ingredients are super clean and cruelty-free.   The color u2018Original Recipe is the absolute perfect shade of red!!  Will recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has good wearability, its a nice product overall, and is one i think ill get a lot of use out of. i think this brand will wind up being a good one, or at least a solid one. looking forward to what comes next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite liquid lippie! Not only is this red shade perfect its also long wearing. Usually red lipsticks (even stains and long wear) fade out or start to bleed or feather but not this one! I put it to the test too! I skated, ate and drank.. and it didnt budge! I also love the fact that it is clean which is a rare thing when it comes to liquid lipsticks. The only thing is that I wish the applicator wand was better. The tip should be more pointed for a precise application but again its nothing I cant fix. Because of this formula I am excited to try her other products!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this lipstick. It dries quickly but wasnt too drying on the lips. The colour was amazing and lasted well. I loved it so much I sent one to a friend just to share the love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Shade: True Red (post from yesterday shows it on me)  Thoughts:  First this is a gorgeous red. A signature look when it comes to beautiful Gwen Stefani.  The pigment payoff with this liquid lipstick is sick. One swipe and you get gorgeous payoff.   The packaging is stunning and shows off the intense red color inside. It wears really comfortable, enough that I forgot I was even wearing it!   The only cons  I have for this is that it does transfer. I wore this for about 4 hours. I drank, ate, and kissed my loves and as you can see it transfers. The close up shows you what it looks like (after ~ 4 hours of wear) before I took it off for the night. You can see it wearing off some - so reapplying might be a good idea if youre out and about whining and dining for awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This color is just the best kind of red! Especially, if youre a lover of a red lip. It dries down beautifully, which allows for more than one application if you want to build color. Thankfully not cakey as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid lipstick is a beautiful bright red. It is different red (warmer) than the matte and Satin bullet lipstick from GXVE. It is lightweight on the lips. It didnot dry out my lips or made it look cracked. It was not hydrating either. It stayed well for almost 6 to 7 hours with out feathering or transferring to mask. It was easy to remove this lipstick. I think it is expensive considering the similar formula is available at drugstore. The packaging looks luxe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! Im not really super into a lot of red shades but I love this formula and applicator. The formula is creamy, smells amazing, isnt too drying and doesnt emphasize my lines or dryness! The shade is a perfect true red!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been DYING for a perfect Gwen Stefani red lipstick since I was 13 and now its finally here. And to double down its a matte liquid, lightweight, long-wearing formula. I will note this is more of a blue red than an orange red. I had dabbled in her UD collab years ago and am so happy we have a new beauty line from the queen herself. I am intrigued to see how this compares to the other lipstick. I can't wait to see what else she does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like the rest of you, I fell in love with red lipstick at the first sight of Gwen. This is honestly the best Ive ever worn. The color is rich and vibrant. Its matte without feeling dry. And it stays put. I tried it on before a shower and it did not budge. Wow! Obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For starters... I think this is a makeup line No Doubt/Gwen fans have been waiting for! The packaging is stunning, true GS branding. They're surprising larger than expected. The liquid lip smells delicious, like vanilla frosting. Applies so easy, so smoothly, and full of pigment! It's a matte, but not drying, I can still rub my lips together without them sticking together or with rub off/them feeling like sandpaper. I have tanned skinned, and the red pops! very flattering. I did let it dry for a few minutes and kissed my hand to test, and there was minor rub off, but the color on my lips didn't move.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I am LITERALLY SO IN LOVE with thisu2026. Gwen has literally killed it with her first launchu2026 her eyeshadow palette AND this are INCREDIBLE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how comfortable this is on my lips!! It left my lips so smooth and its not sticky. It adds the perfect amount of color and leaves a beautiful shine. The packaging and the product are beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do not like this. Like Im sure many people were, I looked forward to using this because Ive been in awe of Gwens bright red lips in her videos. This is a bold red, Ill give it that. But it smells like fake lipstick, dries matte but transfers, and leaves the centre of my lips without colour. I like the heaviness of the packaging but I find the writing on the sides very tacky. If youre looking for a bold red, this does not disappoint. It will get you through the pictures and videos. But otherwise, Im not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fav lipstick finish is matte. I have multiple ones from drug store to high end. I have never felt something so drying. It felt like all the moisture was being sucked out from my lips. This is so uncomfortable I couldnt stand it after only 5 mins. The color is beautiful and it is transfer proof. I have other formulas I prefer that arent as drying as this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great starting launch by Gwen with her iconic red lips. I am curious to see what else she has coming as although this matte lipstick is great with a non-drying matte formula, this could have been collabed with any other brand like  MAC or Urban Decay? Especially when competing with Fenty's Stunna Lip Paint at this price point.. I was just looking for ~special~ especially for another celeb brand and even more so on another red lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought all matte lipstick will make my lip's skin peel off until I meet this Matte Matte Liquid Lipstick. Only a very light layer will do the perfect color but it's totally buildable after the first layer dries down.  It has a vanilla scent and I really love the clean ingredients they use.  It just took a few seconds to dry off and my lips feel very comfortable without feeling drying off. Love this bloody red color for a sexy date night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly I appreciate its cruelty free and clean brand. I love how this brand is highly pigmented in colors be it lipstick or eyeliner. Beautiful bright ted shade. Easy use of applicator on lips and one coat was enough for me to achieve bold red look. Takes few seconds to dry up. I found this formula really rich and intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love the packaging the formula it looks super chic and love how you can see the color through the packaging and the formula drys fast and is really confortable in the lips lasted a long time on the lips love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This red!! Such a gorgeous shade. I could see this looking amazing on any skin tone. Im impressed with the formula as well u2014 its quite thin on the lips and it dries down matte but still comfortable. No cracking or pilling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness this is the cutest lipstick ever!!!  It is super lightweight and shiny and glossy.  It is easy to carry and apply, and works on my fry lips.   I LOVE! Thank you for the gift, its going to good use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such an iconic brand! This red is amazing. The formula is nice and light. Im so happy to have been able to try this. The packaging is sleek and simple. I wish she would have released this line sooner! I cant wait to try it all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited to try Gwens new line as I am a fan.  The shade of red reminds me of her and is so pretty on.  Also, the formula smells like vanilla cake batter!  I seriously cant stop smelling it.  It dried down a little but is not transfer proof.  I can see me wearing this for a special occasion but not every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this liquid lip out! The formula is really nice, super pigmented & not overly drying. The color is beautiful & very flattering for my fair skin. It does get a tiny bit tacky when dry but not too bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try the new GXVE by Gwen Stefani Im Still Here Lightweight Longwear Clean Liquid Lipstick that is a bright red lipstick that is so Gwen! It truly is a highly pigmented matte red lipstick that is budge proof and stays on for hour and hours with no fading, feathering or transferring. I apply it by using the tip of the applicator to outline my lips and then fill in my lips next for the perfect pout. It is also buildable so if you want to apply a second layer just wait a maybe a minute for first to dry before applying second layer, but for me honestly its so pigmented one or two layers is all you need. This honestly is the perfect red lipstick and I believe to be universally flattering for everyone! I love that this brand is also a clean, cruelty free, and vegan brand so I feel good using it. Ill be reaching for this red lipstick all the time and if you are looking for the perfect red lipstick this is for you no doubt!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the applicator of this liquid lipstick and formula. Its perfect for red lips as it doesnt smudge at all. It gives rich color from one swipe and doesnt smudge at all. Feels very comfortable on the lips and has subtle scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved using the new Lightweight Longwear Matte Liquid Lipstick by Gwen Stefani in Im Still Here Original Recipe. It a darker shade than I normally wear, but its flattering. I love the minimalist box, but it has a colorful pattern inside the box. It glides on smoothly. It is highly pigmented and stays on a long time. I love the container. Its very glam looking. I lined my lips first and then filled in the middle. Its a very vibrant red. I received several compliments.  Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the packaging ! Its so sleek and lush and pretty. It definitely gives luxury vibes. The color is amazing as well a beautiful bold red. It wasnt drying on the lips either like most are and it didnt flake up either. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If your looking for bold, fierce, and stunning red, this is your red. It will have you standing out and feeling beautiful all night long. I had no issues wearing it all night and didnt have to reapply. It was lightweight and color never faded. The packaging is one of a kind and my style.  If your looking for bold, fierce, and stunning red, this is your red. It will have you standing out and feeling beautiful all night long. I had no issues wearing it all night and didnt have to reapply. It was lightweight and color never faded. The packaging is one of a kind and my style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Went on so smooth and seamlessly.  Didnt smudge or transfer to my teeth, dried quickly!  Very bold and pure red! Highly recommend and cant wait to try other colors as well if they make them!  A definite win in my book!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid lipstick is incredible. I love that it is a long lasting  lipstick and it looks gorgeous on my lips. I love that it is very easy to put on and the color lasts for a very long time. It goes on super smooth and looks gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This might just be my new favorite makeup brand! I love the formula of this liquid lipstick so much! The pigment is RICH too! The packaging is absolutely gorgeous and it lasts almost all day for me! No drying out my lips either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful long lasting, true red lipstick. I love the undertone of it because it doesn't make the teeth look bad. Also I think this shade can be a perfect match for any skin tone. The formula feels absolutely comfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Its super red! So if you like a really good red lip this is for you! It goes on so smooth and I never had a matte lipstick go on so smooth and light weight. High recommend this product!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color of this liquid lipstick is RICH! Right out of the box the packaging feels so luxurious and sleek. I got this in the shade original recipe and this is definitely going to be my signature shade! It is the perfect red that glides on silky smooth and keeps my lips from getting chapped. After it dries it is not going anywhere throughout the day. Ive drank my coffee, ate my meals without avoiding my lips, and didnt even need a touch up! I highly recommend if youre looking for an everyday statement lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love discovering new red shades and I was very exited to try this liquid lipstick. The formula is clean, long lasting and lightweight. It doesnt fade nor transfer. It dries down to an ultra-matte finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This color is perfection! It builds really nicely and is super easy to apply. I love the formula and how lightweight this lipstick feels when you put it on. This is definitely going to be one of my go-to products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its so pretty on and super comfortable to wear! Its definitely a statement red that everyone needs in their collection! I love that it doesnt dry my lips out too!!! Very excited to see what else she comes out with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg, I am totally obsessed with this lipcolor. Love how pigmented it is and how beautiful the color looks. Its matte but its not drying or uncomfortable. This lipstick is long stay too, it lasts me a long time without smudging. Talking about the packaging, its just too cute. All in all a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE Beauty Lightweight Longwear Clean Liquid Lipstick is really pigmented. It applies beautifully and is comfortable through the day. It dries fast and the applicator makes it easy to apply. Love the packaging as well. This product is vegan and comes in recyclable packaging. The color is gorgeous. It feels lightweight on the lips and  smells like cookies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this GXVE Beauty Lightweight Longwear Clean Liquid Lipstick from GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI in exchange for my honest review. The shade Original Recipe is a gorgeous true red. This liquid lipstick is truly lightweight and does not seem overly drying. It has staying power and wears well even when drinking. There is a very trace amount of transfer when drinking but it does not affect the overall look of the lipstick. It also has the intoxicating scent of vanilla cupcake frosting. Overall this lipstick is a new favorite and I can't wait to collect other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the color and how light it was. It didnt feel sticky on my lips and had a bright matte color. It lasted most of the day including eating. I found the price more really good too for a long lasting lip color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This beautiful lippie from Gwen Stephani's new makeup line is so lovely. These colors really pop and they last all day long! I love the doe foot applicator too. It so soft and applys the lipstick like a dream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gwens signature red lip is one of the most iconic looks in pop culture and now we can have it too! This shade of red is absolute perfection! Its the type of red that makes your teeth look whiter and eyes look brighter (blue eyed babes: it makes your eyes bluer too! ) and on top of that the mousse-like formula is amazing! It is easy to apply with no bleeding, matte but not drying at all and it is super comfortable on the lips. It even lasts all day without smudging or transferringu2026.Im in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is amazing, vibrant red color and very pigmented too. Its matte without leaving my lips feeling cracked and flake off. It applies beautifully, stays on the lips for a long time. I would recommend to put lip conditioner before applying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Im not usually drawn to red shades but this looks stunning on me! Its definitely super matte, and dries down rather fast, so you can get on with your next steps. It smells like cookies or something sweet. I would say its on the higher end of matte lipsticks in terms of feel u2014 it doesnt feel super drying or uncomfortable. And it really doesnt budge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My my my how impressed am with this baddie! I wore this red for a photoshoot (I NEVER wear red) and it POPPED in pics! It legit stayed on all nightu2014up until i removed it for the night! It was highly pigmented and super comfortable wear!! Matte but not drying whatsoever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its a great liquid lipstick and lightweight texture. The red color is really beautiful. It does not dry my lip and it is transfer proof. Its very pigmented and dry fast, but its last long on my lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from GXVE. My favorite thing is the packaging! I love it so much! The pigment is beautiful it truly is a true red. I love the shape of the applicator it makes it so easy to apply! It is  drying on the lips and once its completely dry it barley transfers so I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off, love the color. Such a beautiful red, very vibrant and bold. It does dry down to a matte finish but doesnt look crusty. I think the packaging is cute but it is quite large for no reason. I prefer smaller packaging to make it easier to carry around with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this liquid lipstick!! The packaging is so cute!! The color is amazing and its a comfortable matte so it isnt drying on the lips! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to try a new liquid lipstick!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the matte finish of this lipstick! It doesnt leave a weird or clumpy feeling after applying two layers either, which is great! The color is beautiful and it lasts a long time. It lasted me throughout the day, so Id highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this product is absolutely beautiful. The formula is soft and smooth and the applicator allows this stunning red lip to go on like a DREAM. Gwen you are an angel, Im so happy that you made this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented and goes on so well. Matte but very hydrating and comfortable. Can we also talk about this color? Gorgeous!! I find it a bit similar to Violettes red color. Wears well and doesnt transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this lip gloss so much ! i apply two layers to get that nice matte finish and its perfect every time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: L It is absolutely gorgeous and the most beautiful shade ever. It is a super comfortable formula And suitable for all skin types too. It is long wearing and lovey shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Lightweight Longwear Clean Liquid Lipstick is incredible! It is super pigmented and very easy to use! It went on super smoothly and looked so cute on! The color is buildable as long as you wait for it to dry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this liquid lipstick! This shade of red is really beautiful and powerful. Very lightweight and long lasting, also transfer free. Also clean formula really win win for me. Packaging is so unique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You guys I am absolutely obsessed!! The color is beautiful, its king wearing, and I feel like an absolute babe with it on! Def channeling my inner Gwen! If youre in need of a red lippie in your life, get this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: thats exactly what i need in my life! good quality really longwear clean lipstick in my fav shade - red. its so rich and vibrant, as well as provides good coverage even if you drink or eat something small!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love red lips and while I have a variety of lipsticks, I prefer liquid lipsticks for my reds. This lipstick is gorgeous! The shade is bold and sexy, and its a shade that would suit anyone. The applicator is perfectly shaped and applies the lipstick easily. The lipstick applies effortlessly, it feels lightweight on the lips and stays on all day. If gives a matte finish, but its very comfortable on the lips and doesnt look/feel dry. Its transfer proof all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the applicator on this, no lip liner needed! It's definitely best to use it on dry lips and then let it sit for a moment before applying a second layer. Such a gorgeous red shade! It's not drying either which was surprising.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!! Super opaque in just one application, a gorgeous red tone that is flattering on all skin tones and really great staying power. What more could you want from a liquid lipstick? If youre on the fence, just get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Vibrant, bold and showstopping! This is the perfect red that gives you that va-va-voom when you want it. The formula is so comfortable to wear. - for a matte liquid lipstick, it's so light on the lips and doesn't transfer at all! It's very long lasting and the color stays on for hours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE Beauty Lightweight Longwear Clean Liquid Lipstick is so easy to use. On dry lips, define & shape with applicator edge, then fill & perfect. LOVE the shade of red. I feel bold and confident wearing this lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am no longer a regular lipstick wearer. I prefer liquid lipsticks now because of their staying power. This liquid lipsticks is lightweight so its not drying to my lips. I love the boldness of the colors. I am incredibly happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This clean formula locks in amped up, budge-proof color with major staying poweru2014no fading, feathering, or transferring. Its stay-true, high-payoff color goes on in one swipe and  dries down to an ultra-matte finish, wearing comfortably on lips all day. Love this universally-flattering true red shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good liquid lipstick !! The formula is really beautiful one swipe opacity and gorgeous true red color . It feels nice and light on the lips which I love because theres nothing worse than having a product on which feels heavy and masking.  Im super impressed !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: was gifted by **secret Launch** new clean makeup brand and This product was so nice on my lips! It really helped defined them and the color is so bold, pigmented, lasts for a long time yet is still buildable and creamy. Overall a good product to use for the lips!
